item.title: Building an AI Sandbox with Docker
item.description: I love Claude Code. I enjoy using coding agents, especially for quick and dirty things that I just need to get working for myself. I use them for all sorts of things, from writing my blog to using Claude Code as a personal stylist to dress me for a wedding I was attending. But when I’m doing coding things, I’m always wary of the potential ways that coding agents could mess up my system.
